channel.title: How do you make npcs have random drops?
channel.description: How do you make npcs have random drops? I'm on a pimpscape source. Please help. I'm stupid.

item.title: How do you make npcs have random drops?
item.dc:creator: @InternalorExternalCo InternalorExternalCommand
item.description:
@InternalorExternalCo wrote:

Go to your file. Item2 or Item3 find the right monster you want to have drop the items. Enter the ID’s of the items you want dropped. Compile-> Run->

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make npcs have random drops?

item.title: How do you make npcs have random drops?
item.dc:creator: @Fresh_Prince Fresh Prince
item.description:
@Fresh_Prince wrote:

If I add the item id’s next to the monster, it will drop all those items at once when i kill it. I’m looking for how to add random drops with different items.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make npcs have random drops?

item.title: How do you make npcs have random drops?
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

[quote=“InternalorExternalCommand, post:3, topic:88945”][quote author=Fresh Prince link=topic=130118.msg1260502#msg1260502 date=1178255127]
How do you make npcs have random drops? I’m on a pimpscape source. Please help. I’m stupid.
[/quote]
Lol’d irl. If only people could find the right tuts.[/quote]

If that’s not spam, what is it? This is a help topic, and I don’t think that had any useful information…

EDIT: Yeah, basically what I said…
